originalText.text: The team at Lice Busters has taken care of me twice! The facility is clean and the whole staff is amazing. I was so upset when I arrived but the team and especially Yoni put me at ease. The process was painless and they reassured me. The prices are extremely reasonable in comparison to other places in the city and their hours are great. I would recommend them any day. I volunteer at a summer camp so I will be getting checked every summer at Lice Busters!

originalText.text: I have nothing but incredible things to say about lice busters. They were available to our family at every turn....from staying open late to accommodate our entire family, responding quickly to text messages, being available at the drop of a hat for follow-up checks, just generally going above and beyond to make sure the job was DONE. Thank you lice busters! You put our family at ease and helped us out thoroughly.

text.text: I have nothing but incredible things to say about lice busters. originalText.text: I can't say enough about Lice Busters. First of all, when I got the dreaded email from my son's 1st grade class to check the kids' heads that night because there found lice on a student, I texted 3 mommy friends for recommendations on what to do. They all immediately texted back with a link to Lice Busters. Secondly, I booked an in-home visit that evening (because after I checked my son's head, I saw little things stuck to his hair strands), and Yoni from Lice Busters promptly came and checked all our heads (and treated the 2 out of 4 of us that had lice eggs!). He was extremely professional and answered all of our questions....he was also very sweet to our two kids. Finally, when I asked him to return the next evening because I felt paranoid about still having something in my hair (I felt itchy, it was most likely a psychological thing), he came and double-checked both my head and my son's - free of charge. I would definitely use Lice Busters again!!

originalText.text: We’ve been to Licebusters twice and, under the circumstances, it could not have been a more pleasant experience. They were kind and efficient and we left feeling we were in control of the situation. My kids appreciate that they have kids shows to watch on tv and lollipops.

originalText.text: Can't say enough great things about Lice Busters. As a school admin and a parent of a preK child, lice are inevitable and they're a nightmare. These guys take the horror out of the whole experience. Truly they are the best--they're loving, they're quick, and they're super effective.
